title: class A B or C
extract: Class C Motorhome. The Class C motorhome is the compromise between the Class A and the Class B. They are built with a cabin chassis. They are easy to pick out by their overcab sleeping area. ... The Class C motorhome has gas mileage somewhere between the Class A and the Class B motorhome.Jun 25, 2014
extract_html: Class C Motorhome. The Class C motorhome is the compromise between the Class A and the Class B. They are built with a cabin chassis.
